resources.string:
This game is made for "mini project" by 
G.Praneeth 
A.Shashi Prakash 
R.Naveen 
G.Guru Aakash

To create the room and to play,
 click on the create room if you want be a Host of the game 
 Other wise you can click on the room name you are able to see in the list, then you will be the guest
 you can play game with host as first move for the first time
 from second play onwards any one can play first
 You can click on PLAY AGAIN to reset the points
 You can click on MENU to come back to rooms
